title: CompilationError
description: An error that occurred while compiling an executable node.

type.$comment: This is a special property analogous to JSON-LD's `@type` keyword.

id.$comment: This is a special property analogous to JSON-LD's `@id` keyword.

errorMessage.description: The error message or brief description of the error.

errorType.$comment:
Many languages have the concept of alternative types of errors.
For example, Python has various [classes of exceptions](https://docs.python.org/3/tutorial/errors.html).
This property is intended to be used for storing these type names as additional
information that maybe useful to the user attempting to resolve the error.

codeLocation.description: The location that the error occurred.
